member.name: M:SecretNest.RemoteAgency.Helper.ProxyEventHelper.OnRemoteServiceWrapperClosing(System.Guid,System.Nullable{System.Guid})
member.summary: Unlinks specified remote service wrapper from the event registered in proxy objects when the service wrapper is closing.
member.param: The site id of the instance of the Remote Agency which managing the closing service wrapper.
The instance id of the closing service wrapper. When set as , all proxies with sticky target site specified by will be reset. Default value is null.

member.summary: Gets of sets default setting for method calling timeout in milliseconds. Default value is 0 (use default value while initializing). Only valid when building type (not on building instance).

member.summary: Gets or sets default setting for event adding timeout in milliseconds. Default value is 0 (use default value while initializing). Only valid when building type (not on building instance).

member.name: P:SecretNest.RemoteAgency.RemoteAgency.DefaultEventRemovingTimeoutForBuilding
member.summary: Gets or sets default setting for event removing timeout in milliseconds. Default value is 0 (use default value while initializing). Only valid when building type (not on building instance).

member.name: P:SecretNest.RemoteAgency.RemoteAgency.DefaultEventRaisingTimeoutForBuilding
member.summary: Gets or sets default setting for event raising timeout in milliseconds. Default value is 0 (use default value while initializing). Only valid when building type (not on building instance).

member.name: P:SecretNest.RemoteAgency.RemoteAgency.DefaultPropertyGettingTimeoutForBuilding
member.summary: Gets or sets default setting for property getting timeout in milliseconds. Default value is 0 (use default value while initializing). Only valid when building type (not on building instance).

member.name: P:SecretNest.RemoteAgency.RemoteAgency.DefaultPropertySettingTimeoutForBuilding
member.summary: Gets or sets default setting for property setting timeout in milliseconds. Default value is 0 (use default value while initializing). Only valid when building type (not on building instance).

member.name: M:SecretNest.RemoteAgency.RemoteAgency.CloseAllInstances(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Closes all proxy and service wrapper objects.
member.param: Whether need to send special command to notify the remote site. Default is .
member.exception: Thrown when exception occurred while disposing instances.

member.name: M:SecretNest.RemoteAgency.RemoteAgency.CloseInstance(System.Guid)
member.summary: Closes the proxy or service wrapper by instance id.
member.param: Instance id of the proxy or service wrapper to be closed.
member.returns: Result. when instance is located and closed; when instance is not found.
member.exception: Thrown when exception occurred while disposing instance.

member.name: M:SecretNest.RemoteAgency.RemoteAgency.CloseProxy(System.Object)
member.summary: Closes the proxy object.
member.param: Proxy to be closed.
member.returns: Result. when instance is located and closed; when instance is not found.

member.name: M:SecretNest.RemoteAgency.RemoteAgency.CreateProxy(System.Type,System.Guid,System.Guid,System.Guid@,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Creates proxy of the interface specified.
member.param: Type of the service contract interface to be implemented by this proxy.
Target site id of the created proxy instance.
Target instance id of the created proxy instance.
Id of the created proxy instance. A new id is generated if value is set as .Empty.
Default timeout in milliseconds for all operations; or -1 to indicate that the waiting does not time out. Value cannot be 0. Default value is 90000 (90 sec).
When building is required, builds service wrapper and its required entities in the same assembly. Default value is .
member.remarks: The types required will be created when necessary.
member.event: Raised before type building finished when a type is required for building.
Raised before module and assembly building finished when a type is required for building.
Raised after the assembly built when a type is required for building.

member.name: M:SecretNest.RemoteAgency.RemoteAgency.CreateServiceWrapper(System.Type,System.Object,System.Guid@,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Creates service wrapper of the interface and the service object specified.
member.param: Type of service contract interface to be implemented by this service wrapper and have been implemented by the .
The service object to be wrapped.
Id of the created service wrapper instance. A new id is generated if value is set as .Empty.
Default timeout in milliseconds for all operations; or -1 to indicate that the waiting does not time out. Value cannot be 0. Default value is 90000 (90 sec).
When building is required, builds proxy and its required entities in the same assembly. Default value is .
member.returns: The id of the service wrapper instance created.
member.remarks: The types required will be created when necessary.
member.event: Raised before type building finished when a type is required for building.
Raised before module and assembly building finished when a type is required for building.
Raised after the assembly built when a type is required for building.

member.name: M:SecretNest.RemoteAgency.RemoteAgency.Ping(System.Guid,System.TimeSpan,System.Guid@,System.Guid@)
member.summary: Pings to the default target and get the response.
member.param: Instance id of the local proxy which will be used to initiate the ping process.
Max waiting time.
Will be set as the sender site id of the response message. Or the target site id of the ping message when no response received.
Will be set as the sender instance id of the response message. Or the target instance id of the ping message when no response received.
member.returns: Delay between ping message sending started and response message processing finished.

member.name: M:SecretNest.RemoteAgency.RemoteAgency.Ping(System.Guid,System.Guid@,System.Guid@)
member.summary: Pings to the default target and get the response, using default waiting time which is 90 secs.
member.param: Instance id of the local proxy which will be used to initiate the ping process.
Will be set as the sender site id of the response message. Or the target site id of the ping message when no response received.
Will be set as the sender instance id of the response message. Or the target instance id of the ping message when no response received.
member.returns: Delay between ping message sending started and response message processing finished.

member.name: M:SecretNest.RemoteAgency.RemoteAgency.TryPing(System.Guid,System.TimeSpan,System.TimeSpan@,System.Guid@,System.Guid@,System.Exception@)
member.summary: Tries to ping to the default target and get the response.
member.param: Instance id of the local proxy which will be used to initiate the ping process.
Max waiting time.
Will be set as the delay between ping message sending started and response message processing finished.
Will be set as the sender site id of the response message. Or the target site id of the ping message when no response received.
Will be set as the sender instance id of the response message. Or the target instance id of the ping message when no response received.
Will be set as the exception object when available.
member.returns: Whether the ping request and response processing are finished successfully.

member.name: M:SecretNest.RemoteAgency.RemoteAgency.TryPing(System.Guid,System.TimeSpan@,System.Guid@,System.Guid@,System.Exception@)
member.summary: Tries to ping to the default target and get the response, using default waiting time which is 90 secs.
member.param: Instance id of the local proxy which will be used to initiate the ping process.
Will be set as the delay between ping message sending started and response message processing finished.
Will be set as the sender site id of the response message. Or the target site id of the ping message when no response received.
Will be set as the sender instance id of the response message. Or the target instance id of the ping message when no response received.
Will be set as the exception object when available.
member.returns: Whether the ping request and response processing are finished successfully.

member.name: P:SecretNest.RemoteAgency.RemoteAgency.LoopbackAddressDetection
member.summary: Enables or disables loopback address detection before sending a message. Default value is .

member.name: P:SecretNest.RemoteAgency.RemoteAgency.WaitingTimeForDisposing
member.summary: Gets or sets the waiting time in milliseconds for waiting a managing object to complete all communication operations before being disposed.
member.remarks: The code waiting for response will throw a when the communication operation is halt due to disposing.

member.name: M:SecretNest.RemoteAgency.RemoteAgency.OnRemoteProxyClosing(System.Guid,System.Nullable{System.Guid})
member.summary: Unlinks specified remote proxy from the event registered in service wrapper objects.
member.param: The site id of the instance of the Remote Agency which managing the closing proxy.
The instance id of the closing proxy. When set as null, all proxies from the site specified by will be unlinked. Default value is null.

remarks.para: A message to notify the closing is sent automatically while remote proxy closing. Call this method manually if exception is thrown while processing the closing of the remote proxy.

Service wrapper manages links of all proxies which need to handle events. When remote proxy is closed, message for removing event handlers is sent to the service wrapper. But when something wrong happened, network disconnected or proxy crashed for example, the crucial messages may not be able to transferred correctly. In this case, this method need to be called, or the obsolete links will stay in service wrapper which may cause lags or exceptions while processing events.

member.name: M:SecretNest.RemoteAgency.RemoteAgency.OnRemoteServiceWrapperClosing(System.Guid,System.Nullable{System.Guid})
member.summary: Resets sticky target site of all affected proxies and unlinks specified remote service wrapper from the event registered in proxy objects when the service wrapper is closing.
member.param: The site id of the instance of the Remote Agency which managing the closing service wrapper.
The instance id of the closing service wrapper. When set as , all proxies with sticky target site specified by will be reset. Default value is .

remarks.para: A message to notify the closing is sent automatically while remote service wrapper closing. Call this method manually if exception is thrown while processing the closing of the remote service wrapper.

Proxy manages links of all service wrappers which is registered as an event raiser. When remote service wrapper is closed, message for removing the link of the event handler is sent to the proxy. But when something wrong happened, network disconnected or service wrapper crashed for example, the crucial messages may not be able to transferred correctly. In this case, this method need to be called, or the obsolete links will stay in proxy which may cause lags or exceptions while processing events.

member.name: M:SecretNest.RemoteAgency.RemoteAgency.TryAddSequentialScheduler(System.String,SecretNest.TaskSchedulers.SequentialScheduler@,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Tries to add a task scheduler, which run tasks on a single thread, for accessing assets to the instance of Remote Agency.
member.param: Name of the task scheduler.
Created task scheduler.
Waiting for SequentialScheduler.Run() to provide thread. Default is .

remarks.para: When initializing with set as , a free thread is created for this scheduler.
When initializing with set as , SequentialScheduler.Run() should be called from the thread which intends to be used for this scheduler before processing required by any interface.
This event is not present in Neat release.

member.name: M:SecretNest.RemoteAgency.RemoteAgency`2.CreateProxy``1(System.Guid,System.Guid,System.Guid@,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Creates proxy of the interface specified.
member.typeparam: Service contract interface to be implemented by this proxy.
member.param: Target site id of the created proxy instance.
Target instance id of the created proxy instance.
Id of the created proxy instance. A new id is generated if value is set as .Empty.
Default timeout in milliseconds for all operations; or -1 to indicate that the waiting does not time out. Value cannot be 0. Default value is 90000 (90 sec).
When building is required, builds service wrapper and its required entities in the same assembly. Default value is .
member.remarks: The types required will be created when necessary.
member.event: Raised before type building finished when a type is required for building.
Raised before module and assembly building finished when a type is required for building.
Raised after the assembly built when a type is required for building.

Default timeout in milliseconds for all operations; or -1 to indicate that the waiting does not time out. Value cannot be 0. Default value is 90000 (90 sec).
When building is required, builds proxy and its required entities in the same assembly. Default value is .
member.returns: The id of the service wrapper instance created.
member.remarks: The types required will be created when necessary.
member.event: Raised before type building finished when a type is required for building.

member.remarks: Assembly saving is not supported by .net core. This method is only for .net framework.
member.exception: Thrown when called in .net core app.
